Friday, January 6, 2006

Snakes and Rubies video now available

Posted by marcel

Several months ago we announced the Snakes and Rubies event that took place in Chicago. It was well attended and lively and the entire thing was recorded. The footage is now available for download.

The recording is approximately 3 hours long so show your thanks to those who are making it avaliable to you by jumping onto the torrent if you’re inclined.
